title: Updating fontforge on Windows XP
content:
I tried to do the uninstall of the last build of fontforge to update to the current build. But when I try to uninstall nothing seems to happen. I looked in the cygwin folder and the older package is still there. How exactly do I go about updating to the current build?

 [‹ Converting pfb to mac fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015935/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37469 "Go to previous forum topic") [OpenType font editor update ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015935/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37671 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content: You should really post this to the fontforge-users mailing list, where the primary author of FontForge is more likely to help you out.
